BP.term: detection of chemical stimulus involved in sensory perception of sweet taste

interpro.desc: GPCR, family 3, nine cysteines domain superfamily

name: taste 1 receptor member 3

kegg.name: Carbohydrate digestion and absorption - Homo sapiens (human)

reactome.name: Sensory perception of sweet, bitter, and umami (glutamate) taste
Sensory perception of sweet, bitter, and umami (glutamate) taste

summary: The protein encoded by this gene is a G-protein coupled receptor involved in taste responses. The encoded protein can form a heterodimeric receptor with TAS1R1 to elicit the umami taste response, or it can bind with TAS1R2 to form a receptor for the sweet taste response. [provided by RefSeq, Nov 2015].
